Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Netherworld Lane, south of Chancellor's Hall.
Room.LongDescription: The large Chancellor's Hall building on the north side of the road covers much of this city block and has over one hundred separate lecture halls and classrooms. Most of the classes are taught in the Chancellor's Hall building, but most of the research is done on the south side of the road in Tholian Hall or the Technological Research Facility.
